visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar column chart with inverted axes. The chart should display the number of winter Olympic medals for the top 5 countries: Norway, United States, Germany, Canada, and Austria. The chart should have a title 'Winter Olympic medals per existing country (TOP 5)' and use custom colors for the series. The x-axis should display country names with their respective flags, and the y-axis should represent the number of medals. The chart should also include accessibility features and custom styling for labels and axes.

title.text: Winter Olympic medals per existing country (TOP 5)

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a polar column chart with inverted axes to display the number of winter Olympic medals for the top 5 countries. The chart includes a title 'Winter Olympic medals per existing country (TOP 5)' and uses custom colors for the series. The x-axis is configured to display country names with their respective flags, and the y-axis represents the number of medals. The chart also includes accessibility features, such as keyboard navigation and descriptions for screen readers. Additional styling is applied to the labels and axes, including font sizes and alignment. The plot options for the column series include stacking and padding settings to ensure the data is presented clearly and effectively.
